title: An Ode to Independence
content: For release on delivery  11:30 a.m. EDT  March 26, 2010                             An Ode to Independence       Remarks by     Kevin Warsh     Member     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     to the     Shadow Open Market Committee     New York, New York                     March 26, 2010
